title: Estimator Definition
question_text: The mean of a sampling distribution can be considered an unbiased estimate of $\mu$ when...

choices.text: there is no major skewness or outliers.

variability is uncertain at first but gets smaller as
n
increases.

a sample mean and population mean
μ
are equal.

the expected value of the sample mean equals the population mean
μ
.

its expected value changes as the sample size
n
increases.
